alert.note: Alert for Bosque; Ellis; Henderson; Hill; Hopkins; Hunt; Johnson; Kaufman; Navarro; Rains; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:38AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hunt, Kaufman, Johnson, Van Zandt, Henderson, northeastern Bosque, Hopkins, Rains, Hill, Ellis and Navarro Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 537 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near East Tawakoni to Mabank to 6 miles northeast of Italy to near Cleburne. Movement was southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Grand Prairie, Mansfield, Cedar Hill, Burleson, Lancaster, Waxahachie, Cleburne, Greenville, Corsicana, Ennis, Midlothian, Terrell, Sulphur Springs, Athens, Glenn Heights, Red Oak, Hillsboro, Commerce, Kaufman and Keene. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 355 and 369. Interstate 35W between mile markers 1 and 36. Interstate 35E between mile markers 371 and 411. Interstate 20 between mile markers 499 and 541. Interstate 30 between mile markers 85 and 142. Interstate 45 between mile markers 213 and 267. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bosque; Ellis; Henderson; Hill; Hopkins; Hunt; Johnson; Kaufman; Navarro; Rains; Van Zandt
